description: 学习一般过去时的基本用法：表示过去发生的动作或状态

basic_rules: 一般过去时表示过去发生的动作或状态
过去式分为规则变化和不规则变化
常与表示过去的时间状语连用
time_adverbs: yesterday, last week, last month, last year
this morning, this afternoon, this evening
common_errors: I go to school yesterday. (错误) → I went to school yesterday. (正确)
He play football last week. (错误) → He played football last week. (正确)
She watch TV last night. (错误) → She watched TV last night. (正确)
